posts.post_content:
Have the following T3 for sale .  

Bransfield - PSA 4 - $800
Overall - BVG 1 - $110

all 3 for $950

Please see scans below for condition. Prices are dlvd in the US. Payment by check (will hold to clear), money order, or Paypal friends and family. Regular Paypal is fine, if you cover the fees. Any questions, please let me know.

Thanks
DJ
